mOnAggroTargetAdded.description: Called whenever a aggro target is added

mOnAggroTargetRemoved.description: Called whenever a aggro target is removed

mDisableAIDistance.description: distance for disabling an enemys AI

mNavWalkingDistance.description: distance when we switch movement mode on creatures to PHYS_NavWalking

mMeshTickEnableDistance.description: distance when we completely remove ticking on mesh

mMeshUpdateDistance.description: distance when we switch tick mode on mesh to Tick Only when Rendered

mActivateSpawnerDistance.description: Distance for when we should activate a spawner

mDisablePawnMovement.description: Indicates if we also want to disable pawn movement when we disable the AI

mMaxCreatureIterationsPerTick.description: How many creatures can we iterate over per tick

mMaxSpawnerIterationsPerTick.description: How many spawners can we iterate over per tick
